title: Gallery : Final preparations for Bayern second leg
body_text:
Fresh from our huge North London Derby win at the weekend, our Gunners headed back to the training ground for the final session before facing Bayern Munich on Wednesday night.
Our club photographers were on the ground at London Colney to capture all the preparations for our UEFA Women's Champions League quarter-final tie, which hangs in the balance following last week's narrow loss at the Allianz Arena.
Tickets are still available so join us at Emirates Stadium at 8pm for an evening to remember.
Take a look at the gallery below for all the best shots from training.
